title: Slick New Wireless Speakers Reimagine Your Home Audio Setup
text:
Slick New Wireless Speakers Reimagine Your Home Audio Setup 
Published By: Wired.com - Today 
Portable wireless speakers are usually associated with road trips and so-so audio, but Libratone's new Zipp and Zipp Mini want to replace yo...
